div.head: KALIMAN DE LUJO. EL HOMBRE INCREIBLE
div.cbml:caption:
Serpiente
Humana

¡AHORA, KALIMAN
RELATA EN CADA
REVISTA UNA
NUEVA AVENTURA
COMPLETA DE
SU VIDA!
div.note: K symbol representing logo associated with comic superhero and comicbook
Image on cover shows Kaliman holding scantily-clother woman in his arms as a group of green snakes threaten to attack from the ground.

div.cbml:caption:
DE LAS MIL AVENTURAS QUE EL DESTINO ME HA DEPARADO VIVIR,
ENRIQUECIENDO MIS CONOCIMIENTOS Y FORTALECIENDO MI ESPÍRITU,
DESTACA UNA QUE FUE TAN ESPECTACULAR COMO INCREÍBLE.

VAN A CONOCER ESTA HISTORIA
ASOMBROSA TITULADA…
div.note: Kaliman, dressed in white and wearing a white cape, stands powerful in front of a landscape composed of different world sights, including Egyptian pyramids, the TajMahal, and the Eiffel Tower.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
UNA LEYENDA QUE SE HIZO REALIDAD Y QUE AHORA RECUERDO
VIVAMENTE EMOCIONADO…
cbml:panel.note: A giant green snake stands tall above a couple of semi-naked women in the midst of a fiery space. One woman seems to be dancing, the other one is crouching under the tongue, pointy fangs and blood-shot eyes of the snake. The title for this issue/episode on the top right of the page is also a continuation of the narrator's sentence in the preceding page.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
MI PEQUEÑO AMIGO SOLÍN Y
YO, HABÍAMOS LLEGADO AQUE-
LLA CALUROSA MAÑANA A LA
CIUDAD DE KUALA LUMPUR…
cbml:panel.note: Scene shows Kaliman and Solin walking on a dock, away from a ship that seems to have brought them there. People talk, greet, and go about life around them.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
…UNA EXÓTICA CIUDAD MEZCLA
DE PRIMITIVISMO Y MODERNI-
DAD…
cbml:panel.note: EWS shows a couple being transported on a rickshaw through one of the pebbled streets, while a car crosses behind them. Architecture shows both modern and colonial-style older examples.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
TRATÁBAMOS DE CALMAR LA SED Y EL CALOR EN UN LUGAR DEL
CENTRO DE LA CIUDAD…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¿A QUÉ VENIMOS
EXACTAMENTE A ESTE
LUGAR?
A CUMPLIR UNA CITA.
cbml:panel.note: WS shows both characters sitting at a cafe. A parked car is seen in the backround. The name of a business is written on on the facade of a building, above a window, in oriental characters (Malay? Bahasa Malaysia?). It is floatingText with subtype="storefrontsignage" type="diegetic", but it is not encoded here because language of body is unknown and characters are thus illegible, but it's head has as rendition="#uc #large"

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
UNA MUY IMPORTANTE QUE
SIGNIFICA UN BIEN PARA
LA HUMANIDAD.

EXPLÍCAME CON
MÁS DETALLE, POR
FAVOR.
cbml:panel.note: WS of Kaliman and Solin at the cafe. A clerk and a customer can be seen at the back.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
LA CITA ES CON EL DOCTOR KELLY,
UN FAMOSO CIENTÍFICO QUE HA
DEDICADO SU VIDA A LA INVESTI-
GACIÓN…
cbml:panel.note: Image of Dr. Kelly on the right of frame has cloud-like borders representing thought or memory that Kaliman has of him as he speaks. MS of Dr. Kelly shows him in his lab, holding a beaker, and surrounded by scientific equipment and books.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
SOBRE TODO, HA INVESTIGADO
CON PLANTAS TROPICALES.
cbml:panel.note: Dr. Kelly is seen in the jungle, examining a plant. He is wearing a yellow explorer suit.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
SIN IMPORTARLE PELIGROS QUE
EN NUMEROSAS OCASIONES
HAN PUESTO SU VIDA EN
JUEGO.
cbml:panel.note: Angled shot from above of Dr. Kelly seen waist-deep in water. He has a terrified expression on his face and is looking and reaching up as if asking to be helped. Red lines come out of his head, representing his fear or anxiety.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
Y DESPUÉS DE MUCHOS AÑOS DE
INVESTIGACIONES, PARECE QUE
HA ENCONTRADO ALGO SENSA-
CIONAL.
cbml:panel.note: Left side of the panel shows CU of Kaliman speaking. On the right, a dream-like WS image (cloud-like borders representing thought or memory that Kaliman has of him as he speaks) of a scientist looking into a microscope in a lab, as seen from behind.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
UN POSIBLE REMEDIO CONTRA EL
MAL QUE AZOTA A LA HUMANI-
DAD, MÁS ANTIGUO Y DESPIA-
DADO: EL CÁNCER.
cbml:panel.note: Lateral WS of Asian-looking male with bare torso, leaning against a table. A desk with what appears to be some glasses and silverware is at the front of the scene. Behind the man there is a big yellowish skull with a purple cover.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
NO PUEDE HABER NOTICIA
MÁS MARAVILLOSA PARA
EL GÉNERO HUMANO.

YA LO CREO. AL FIN
ENCONTRAR REMEDIO A ESE
TERRIBLE MAL.
cbml:panel.note: WS of Solin and Kaliman seen sitting at their table at the cafe. Left side of panel shows someone, perhaps a clerk or a waiter, standing in the back. The forefront of the panel is occupied by a bush, as if point-of view came from behind it.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
SEGÚN ME HA ESCRITO, SUS
EXPERIMENTOS DAN RESULTADOS
POSITIVOS EN UN NOVENTA POR
CIENTO DE LOS CASOS.
cbml:panel.note: MCU of Dr. Kelly performing a scientific experiment in his lab on the left of the frame. Right of the frame shows MCU of Kaliman narrating.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
Y POR ESO ESTAMOS AQUÍ. EL
DOCTOR KELLY ME ESCRIBIÓ
PIDIENDO QUE VINIERA A
COMPROBAR SUS EXPERIMEN-
TOS.

CADA
VEZ ESTOY
MÁS
INTERESADO.
cbml:panel.note: Lateral CU of Solin's head on the right of the frame, with MCU of Kaliman standing in the back of the room.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
UN NATIVO CON ASPECTO
SOSPECHOSO, SE NOS
HABÍA ACERCADO…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
SÓLO ESPERO LA CONFIRMACIÓN DE
LA CITA PARA VER A NUESTRO
AMIGO.

ESOS DON SON
EXTRANJEROS.
cbml:panel.note: WS OSS shows KAliman and Solin at the cafe sipping at their drinks and speaking while the native stares at them. We can only see native from behind. He is wearing a red shirt and a green turban on his head, and is holding a basket with his right arm.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¿CUÁNDO LO
VEREMOS?

ESPERO QUE
SEA ESTE MISMO
DÍA.
OYE, SAIB.
cbml:panel.note: Lateral WS showing Kaliman and Solin being approached by native with basket.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
CÓMPRAME UN RECUERDO DE
ESTE LUGAR. NO TE ARREPEN-
TIRÁS.

¿QUÉ CLASE DE
RECUERDO?
cbml:panel.note: Kaliman and Solin stare at each other in amazement, wile native speaks from the back. The basket is set on top of the table.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
MÍRALO TÚ
MISMO.
cbml:panel.note: Lateral WS shows while he offers the basket to Solin. Kaliman watches from the background.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
MIENTRAS EL NATIVO DESTAPABA
SU CESTO, SOLÍN SE ACERCÓ CON
CURIOSIDAD.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
APROXIMATE
MÁS.
cbml:panel.note: Lateral MCU of Solin, who stares at the basket with wide eyes. Natives hands are seen in CU as he opens the lid to the basket.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
DE REPENTE, SE ASOMARON SIL-
BANDO AMENAZADORAMENTE VA-
RIAS SERPIENTES, HACIENDO
QUE SOLÍN SALTARA SORPRENDIDO
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ¡AAAAAYYY!

¡JA JA
JA!
cbml:panel.note: Lateral WS showing Solin screaming on the left of the frame, backing away from the basket as four green snakes come out of it. The native watches and laughs in amusement, while Kaliman watches from the back (in the middle of the frame). His face shows some concern as he looks at Solin.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
EL NATIVO, BURLÓN, ACERCÓ
MÁS EL CESTO A LA CARITA
HORRORIZADA DEL MUCHA-
CHO.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¿NO QUIERES QUE
TE HAGAN UNA
CARICIA?
¡NO ME LAS ACERQUES, POR FAVOR!
cbml:panel.note: Lateral MCU shows Solin scared as the native pushes the basket with hissing snakes closer to his face.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
DECIDÍ INTERVENIR
PARA TRANQUILIZAR
A SOLÍN…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
RECUERDA, SOLÍN, QUE
EL PEOR ENEMIGO
ES EL MIEDO.

¡CUIDADO,
SAIB, SI TE
MUERDEN TE
MUERES!
cbml:panel.note: WS shows Kaliman on the right as he speaks calmly to Solin, who is off frame. Kaliman's right arm reaches out toward the snakes as native holding the basket watches from the background with a schocked look on his face.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
SON TAN INOFENSIVAS
COMO GATITOS.
cbml:panel.note: MCU of Kaliman as he holds the snakes in his left hand.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
UN MOSQUITO PUEDE HACER
MÁS DAÑO QUE ÉSTAS.
¡MALDITO EXTRANJERO!
cbml:panel.note: Lateral CU of Kaliman as he speaks and holds the snakes. Native watches with angry expression from the background.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
PERO LO QUE MENOS IMAGINÁBA-
MOS ERA QUE TODO AQUELLO FOR-
MABA PARTE DE UN COMPLOT…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ¡MORIRÁN!
cbml:panel.note: WS shows anonymous man in purple robes approaching from the left of the frame carrying a basket, while Kaliman, Solin, and the native stand on the right of the room.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
JAMÁS RECURRAS AL ENGAÑO
PORQUE SERÁS ENGAÑADO.
¡LLÉVATELAS!
¡JA JA JA!
cbml:panel.note: WS of the three. Native, on the left, holds his basket and looks ashamed. He seems much shorter than Kaliman, in the center, who looks tall and strong as he gives his moral advice. Solin on the right of the frame stands next to Kaliman and laughs.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
EL NATIVO SE ALEJÓ CON ENFADO
MURMURANDO INSULTOS…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¡PERROS EXTRANJEROS, POR ESO
LOS ODIAMOS!

ES HORA DE
MARCHARNOS,
MI PEQUEÑO
SOLÍN.
DE ACUERDO.
cbml:panel.note: WS shows Solin on the left and Kaliman on the right, while Native walks away in the background. Two main characters smile.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¡MIRA! SE LE OLVIDÓ
UNA SERPIENTE.
cbml:panel.note: Lateral MCU of solin as he tries to get closer to the green snake hissing under a chair.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
CUANDO SOLÍN SE DISPONÍA A
AGARRAR INGENUAMENTE A LA
SERPIENTE…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
HAY QUE
RECOGERLA.

¡NO LA
TOQUES!
cbml:panel.note: Lateral CU of Kaliman's head as he yells a warning to Solin, who is seen on the left of the frame getting closer to the hissing snake.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
LO APARTÉ RÁPIDAMENTE EN EL
PRECISO INSTANTE EN QUE EL
REPTIL LANZABA UNA MORDIDA
AL AIRE…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
ESTA SÍ ES
VENENOSA.
¡AAAAGH!
cbml:panel.note: WS of Kaliman pulling Solin away from the snake, which is hissing and lunging from the left of the frame.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
Y EN RÁPIDO MOVIMIENTO, LA
ATRAPÉ, SUJETÁNDOLA FUER-
TEMENTE POR DEBAJO DE SU
CABEZA…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
LA MORDEDURA DE ÉSTA,
OCASIONA LA MUERTE CASI
INSTANTÁNEAMENTE.

AQUÍ,
SAIB, POR
FAVOR.
cbml:panel.note: WS shows in the center Kaliman as he grabs the hissing snake from right below the head. Solin watches from the left with surprised expression, while anonymous man 2 speaks from the right.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
DEBEN CUIDAR MÁS
ESTOS DETALLES.

PERDÓN, SAIB. NO
SÉ CÓMO PUDO
SUCEDER.

ESE MUCHACHO
NATIVO LA DEJÓ
DEBAJO DE MI
SILLA.
cbml:panel.note: WS shows anonymous man 2 in the center with a worried expression as he watches Kaliman placing the snake in a basket. Solin, on the right of the frame, looks to the horizon on the right, presumably in the directionthe native walked away.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
CUÁNTO VALOR Y SANGRE
FRÍA TIENE ESE EXTRANJERO
PARA HACER ESTO.
cbml:panel.note: MCU of anonymous man 2 walking away with basket while Kaliman and Solin watch from behind.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¿LA DEJARÍA ESE NATIVO PARA
CAUSARME LA MUERTE?

NO LO
SABEMOS.
cbml:panel.note: Kaliman stands tall on right of frame while Solin looks up to him and speaks from the left.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
TRAS EL DESAGRADABLE INCIDENTE,
EMPRENDIMOS LA MARCHA…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
PERO, ¿CÓMO PUEDES DISTINGUIR
UNA SERPIENTE VENENOSA DE LA
QUE NO LO ES?
cbml:panel.note: Lateral MCU of both characters on the street.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
LAS SERPIENTES VENENOSAS
TIENEN LA CABEZA COMO
PUNTA DE FLECHA, LAS
OTRAS SON CHATAS.

¡QUÉ
INTERESANTE!
cbml:panel.note: WS shows Kaliman and Solin on the left, with hissing snakes in CU on the right, immersed in a yellow cloud.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
NO LO OLVIDARÉ. ES UN
MAGNÍFICO CONSEJO.
TAXI.
cbml:panel.note: WS OSS shows Kaliman and Solin standing on the street. Kaliman waves a man with a rickshaw crossing in front of them.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
ALGUIEN MÁS NOS VIGILABA
ATENTAMENTE…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
EL EXTRANJERO
ES INTELIGENTE Y
ASTUTO, PERO TIENE
LOS DÍAS CONTADOS.
cbml:panel.note: Lateral WS shows green-skinned man with a red turban spying on them from behind a wall on a corner as they get on the rickshaw.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
NO PUEDE SALVARSE DE
LA FURIA DE KASANA.
cbml:panel.note: WS shows man with green skin on the right of panel, while two of his accomplices run in toward him from the center of the frame in the background.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
NOS DESCUBRIÓ Y
SE ESCAPÓ.

¡CIERREN
LA BOCA,
IMBÉCILES!
cbml:panel.note: MCU of three men behind a wall on the corner.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
ENTONCES, TENDRÉ EL PLACER
DE CUMPLIR LOS DESIGNIOS
DE KASANA

¿VAS A MATARLO
AHORA MISMO?
cbml:panel.note: Frontal WS shows the three men standing on the street. Green man is brandishing a jagged dagger in his right hand.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
SUS OJOS BRILLABAN COMO LOS
DE UNA SERPIENTE, MIENTRAS SU
MANO EMPUÑABA CON FIRMEZA
EL FILOSO CUCHILLO.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¡KALIMÁN MORIRÁ MUY
PRONTO… KASANA LO
ORDENA!
cbml:panel.note: WS shows three men on the corner. Green man holds the \ dagger in his right hand and makes a gesture of power with his left.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¡EL PERRO
EXTRANJERO MORIRÁ AL
IGUAL QUE TODOS!
cbml:panel.note: MCU of the three men. Green man speaks from the right of the frame while other two watch him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
¿QUIÉN ES
KASANA?

NUESTRO GUÍA
ESPIRITUAL.
cbml:panel.note: MCU of the two anonymous men speaking.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
KASANA ES EL VENGADOR: ODIA
A TODOS LOS EXTRANJEROS Y
HA JURADO EXTERMINARLOS.

¡TENGO EL PODER DE
LOS DIOSES!
cbml:panel.note: CU of Anonymous man 3 describing Kasana, while the latter appears in front, wearing some jewelery and a blue "skirt" around his waist. He is surrounded by flames, and he is raising his arms in a powerful gesture. His speech bubble is somewhat different from the others. His skin is greenishm as is the skin of those who follow him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
PUEDO JURAR QUE MAÑANA…
ESE EXTRANJERO Y EL MUCHACHO
SERÁN CADÁVERES.

¡JA
JA JA!
cbml:panel.note: WS shows the two men running on the street.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
MIENTRAS, SOLÍN Y YO ÉRAMOS
CONDUCIDOS HACIA NUESTRO
HOTEL…
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
SIGO PENSANDO EN EL
MOTIVO POR EL CUAL
ESE JOVEN NATIVO
QUISO MATARME.
cbml:panel.note: WS of the two being transported on the rickshaw to their hotel.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
TAL VEZ NO FUE SU
INTENCIÓN Y TODO HA SIDO
CASUALIDAD.
EXPLÍCAME.
cbml:panel.note: WS frm behind of the two being transported on the rickshaw to their hotel. Shadows of the buildings are cast on the street from the left of the frame.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
DEBES SABER QUE EN ESTAS
ISLAS, SE VENERAN A LAS
SERPIENTES COMO DIOSES.
cbml:panel.note: CU of Kaliman shown in the background, while image of three green and red snakes is seen in the front, immersed in a yellow cloud-like shape.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
CUENTA LA LEYENDA QUE EL
CIELO ENVIÓ AL MAR A UN
DIOS LLAMADO KUBALA.
cbml:panel.note: WS of Kubala diving into the ocean while lightning explodes around and behind him.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
SE CONVIRTIÓ EN GIGANTESCA
SERPIENTE Y AVANZÓ HACIA
LAS ISLAS.
cbml:panel.note: WS of the giant horned snake/Kubala hisssing in battered waters.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
KUBALA DOMINÓ LAS ISLAS, Y
LOS NATIVOS PRESOS DE TERROR,
NO PUDIERON LUCHAR, DISPONIÉN-
DOSE A SER ESCLAVOS.
cbml:panel.note: WS of Kubala as sake attacking the natives who run for their lives amidst fire and terror.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
ESCOGÍAN A LAS MÁS
HERMOSAS MUJERES
VÍRGENES PARA EL
SACRIFICIO HUMANO.
cbml:panel.note: WS of three women scantily clothed being offered to Kubala by two natives.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
LA SANGRE Y LA CARNE HUMANA
LLENABAN DE PLACER Y SATIS-
FACCIÓN AL ESPANTOSO
MONSTRUO.
cbml:panel.note: WS of the giant horned snake/Kubala hisssing and approaching a scantily clothed woman who screams on top of rocks.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
PERO ESO SUCEDÍA HACE
MUCHOS AÑOS, ¿VERDAD?

ESO DICE LA LEYENDA,
PERO MUCHO ME TEMO QUE…
cbml:panel.note: MCU of Kaliman and Solin talking on the street. Solin has a worried expression on his face.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
CASI ADIVINABA LO QUE MUY
PRONTO IBA A DESCUBRIR.
cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
LAS
TRADICIONES Y
COSTUMBRES
PERDURAN A
TRAVÉS DEL TIEMPO.
cbml:panel.note: Frontal CU of Kalima against the bluish and black background of the night.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption:
ES POSIBLE QUE ESOS SACRIFICIOS
HUMANOS, SIGAN EFECTUÁNDOSE
HASTA LA FECHA.
cbml:panel.note: WS of the giant horned snake/Kubala hisssing and devouring a screaming woman while other women scream and try to flee on top of rocks. There is a watermark: www.Kaliman.biz
